casebody.data:
W. E. HEDGER TRANSPORTATION CO., Appellee, v. DOLOMITE MARINE CORP., Appellant. Steamtug THE CENTRAL STATES, Inc., Appellee, Susanna E. Waldie, Appellee. Susanna E. WALDIE, Appellee, v. DOLOMITE MARINE CO. et al., Appellant. DOLOMITE MARINE CORP., Appellee, v. Steamtug THE CENTRAL STATES, Inc., et al., Appellants. Nos. 394-396. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 30, 1939. Adrian J. O’Kane, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellants Dolomite Marine Corporation and Tug Governor. Foley & Martin, of New York City (Christopher E. Heckman, of New York City, of counsel), for appellees, claimant of Tug Cherokee and W. E. Hedger Transportation Corp. Purdy & Lamb, of New York City (John E. Purdy, of New York City, of counsel), for Susanna E. Waldie.

Before L. HAND, CPIASE, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
